mapper.select: select a.chatmember,a.chatroomno,a.user1,a.user2,m.name,m.address,m.profile,cm.chatmessage,NVL((cmm.readst),0)"readst",cm.datetime,d.boardno,e.title from chatmember a Left Join member m ON a.user2 = m.memberno Left Join (SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno,datetime FROM ( SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno,datetime , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY chatroomno ORDER BY chatmessageno DESC) as RowIdx FROM chatmessage ) t1 WHERE RowIdx = 1) cm ON a.chatroomno = cm.chatroomno Left Join (select chatroomno,count(readst)readst FROM chatmessage where readst='1' and seller != #{user1} group by chatroomno ) cmm ON a.chatroomno = cmm.chatroomno left join chatroom d on a.chatroomno=d.chatroomno left join board e on d.boardno=e.boardno where user1 = #{user1} order by cm.chatmessageno desc

select a.chatmember,a.chatroomno,a.user1,a.user2,m.name,m.address,m.profile,cm.chatmessage,NVL((cmm.readst),0)"readst" from chatmember a Left Join member m ON a.user2 = m.memberno Left Join (SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno FROM ( SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY chatroomno ORDER BY chatmessageno DESC) as RowIdx FROM chatmessage ) t1 WHERE RowIdx = 1) cm ON a.chatroomno = cm.chatroomno Left Join (select chatroomno,count(readst)readst FROM chatmessage where readst='1' and seller != #{user1} group by chatroomno ) cmm ON a.chatroomno = cmm.chatroomno where user1 = #{user1} and cmm.readst != 0 order by cm.chatmessageno desc
